section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: atanh calculates the inverse hyperbolic tangent of x. atanhf is identical, other than taking and returning float values.

section.title: Returns
section.p: atanh and atanhf return the calculated value. If is greater than 1, the global errno is set to EDOM and the result is a NaN. A DOMAIN error is reported. If is 1, the global errno is set to EDOM; and the result is infinity with the same sign as x. A SING error is reported. You can modify the error handling for these routines using matherr.
